title: Duck Life 2

controls: Up Arrow: JumpDown Arrow: DiveLeft and Right Arrows: Move Left and Right
Left and Right Arrows: To Climb Up
content.howToPlay: Start with taking part in training sessions. You need to develop your duckling's running, swimming, flying and climbing skills to a certain level.If you enter one of the competitions without improving the animal's skills, it will most likely fall behind its peers.To get the golden crown, you need to train your animal in the hardest way possible in this arcade game.Additionally, you must check its energy level. If the energy level is low, get him seeds from the distribution taps.

fullContent: Homeâ€º AnimalDuck Life 2By OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenBe your baby duckling sports coach and make him the champion racer! Duck Life 2 is a 2D arcade game where you train your duck's core athletic abilities. You must make it ready for the running races.Have it participate in running, swimming, flying and climbing training sessions. When its skills reach certain levels, you can go for the races to get the golden crown in this animal game!ControlsRunningLeft-Click or Spacebar: JumpSwimmingUp Arrow: JumpDown Arrow: DiveLeft and Right Arrows: Move Left and RightFlyingMouse (drag): Change DirectionClimbingLeft and Right Arrows: To Climb UpHow to Play Duck Life 2Start with taking part in training sessions. You need to develop your duckling's running, swimming, flying and climbing skills to a certain level.If you enter one of the competitions without improving the animal's skills, it will most likely fall behind its peers.To get the golden crown, you need to train your animal in the hardest way possible in this arcade game.Additionally, you must check its energy level. If the energy level is low, get him seeds from the distribution taps.Round 1: Cliff JumpingAfter training your duck's skills and making it a strong athletic animal, it is now ready for the races. Each race has a track that involves using more than one ability. For example, the animals will run, fly and swim in the Cliff Jumping race. If the duck gets ahead in running but falls behind in swimming, it can easily lose the race.In the Race Central, you will see that this duck will travel the world for the races. It will start racing in Scotland. After winning competitions in Scotland, it will visit England, Egypt, Hawaii and Japan, respectively for the following races.Duck Life vs. Duck Life 2This game version comes with a new skill compared to the first release, Duck Life. In Duck Life 2, you will need to strengthen the duck's climbing ability as an addition.It needs to climb up by using each side of the canyon. Thus, its stamina will improve significantly. However, it shouldn't get caught on one of the edges. Otherwise, it will go out of the screen and lose the game.DeveloperWix Games created Duck Life 2.You May Also LikeIf you haven't played the original Duck Life, give it a try! In the game, you will try to grow a single duck egg into a champion racer. Someone needs to make money to rebuild the farm!For additional options, look for the arcade games tag on OnlineGames.io. There are dozens of free online game options available. We recommend keeping coming back to discover new ones!This article was updated on October 16, 20241 Player2DAnimalArcadeAvoidCrazyCuteFlyingFreeRacingRPG
